member.name: M:R2API.SkillsAPI.GetHideInLoadout(RoR2.GenericSkill)
member.summary: Gets the value of whether a GenericSkill row should be hidden in loadout tab or not.

member.name: M:R2API.SkillsAPI.SetHideInLoadout(RoR2.GenericSkill,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the value of whether a GenericSkill row should be hidden in loadout tab or not.

member.name: M:R2API.SkillsAPI.GetHideInCharacterSelectIfFirstSkillSelected(RoR2.GenericSkill)
member.summary: Gets the value of whether a GenericSkill row should be hidden in skills tab if the first skill is selected or not.

member.name: M:R2API.SkillsAPI.SetHideInCharacterSelectIfFirstSkillSelected(RoR2.GenericSkill,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the value of whether a GenericSkill row should be hidden in skills tab if the first skill is selected or not.

member.name: M:R2API.SkillsAPI.GetOrderPriority(RoR2.GenericSkill)
member.summary: Gets the value of a GenericSkill row order for sorting in skills and loadout tabs. Default value is 0.

member.name: M:R2API.SkillsAPI.SetOrderPriority(RoR2.GenericSkill,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the value of a GenericSkill row order for sorting in skills and loadout tabs. Default value is 0.

member.name: M:R2API.SkillsAPI.GetLoadoutTitleTokenOverride(RoR2.GenericSkill)
member.summary: Gets the value of a GenericSkill title token that will be used instead of default one in loadout tabs.

member.name: M:R2API.SkillsAPI.SetLoadoutTitleTokenOverride(RoR2.GenericSkill,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value of a GenericSkill title token that will be used instead of default one in loadout tabs.

member.name: F:R2API.SkillsAPI.PluginVersion
member.summary: Version of the plugin, should be matching with the thunderstore package.
